entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
